content.d: L-O-V-E, lovely Haruka! L-O-V-E, lovely Haruka!
I wanna see Haruka-chan perform again!
They said she’s going to be on stage again soon.
Oh, then I want to practice saying “Lovely Haruka!” before that. Kanata-chan, teach me!

Ah, this requires a bit of artisanal skill. There are emotions we want to convey in each and every word, right? And cheerleading is all about blending those emotions... But Emma-chan! You’re enthusiastic, aren’t you!? If that’s the case, Kanata-chan will teach you!!!
Yes! I want to learn! But is it okay for Kanata-chan not to take a nap today? Do you want to rest your head on my lap a little?
Hehehe, Kanata-chan is at full throttle today, so no need for a nap! Now Emma-chan, we don’t have much time until the next stage, so let’s practice right away! L-O-V-E, lovely Haruka!
